Reviews.Title: CT-100 2.8" TFT LCD CCTV Monitor
Reviews.Author: Randy Kellum
Reviews.Content: Nice device, really helps to adjust security cam's in hall and outside. You can see what you are doing with out using radio's and another person at the monitors and all at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: FM Tech
Reviews.Content: It's what you need at the top of a ladder-  It would get  stars if it were a little brighter...  recorder feature is useful, though not well documented.

ProductInfo.Features:
High Resolution (480*640) Portable 2.8" LCD Monitor with Li-Lon Rechargeable Battery.
Support CCD camera of power source. Max electric Currency 600mA, other CCTV testers only 350mA. It's convenient for user to check camera condition and correct direction of camera, so to make installation and repairing easier.
2.8" high image resolution (480*640) monitor enable to show clear image that any place to use.
Equip with Lithium battery of high capacity. Full recharge durable 2.5-5 work hours.
Hand-hold design for professionals. Easy operation without taking off gloves speeds your works. Clasp ring at bottom fits to all chains and use in all environments.
ProductInfo.Name: GadgetZone (US Seller) CT-100 2.8" TFT LCD Monitor CCTV Security Camera Video Tester Test DVR High Battery 12V Power Output 480*640 Resolution
